meanings: have one´s kindness taken advantage of

phrases.phrase: 돈을 주면 배 속의 아이도 기어 나온다
meanings: (속담) A golden key can open any door. or Money answers all things.

meanings.meaning: I'll thank you for something/to do something
give somebody an inch (and they'll take a mile/yard)

vlive.korean: 또 뭘 보여주면 좋아할까? What else would you want to see? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] (우당탕) 타지야~ 미안해~ 나도 어쩔 수 없는 셒구인가봐~ (우당탕) (JAEYOON talking about newly-coined word)
vlive.english: What else would you want to see?

vlive.korean: 하양아 너는 주면 안 된대... They said that I can't give it to you. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: They said that I can't give it to you.

vlive.korean: "머리카락 색 실수인 척 보여주면 안 돼요?" "Can you show us your hair color as if it was an accident"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 즐거운 휴닝로직🤗
vlive.english: "Can you show us your hair color as if it was an accident"?

vlive.korean: 오케이 제가 이거 불러주면 공항에 안 나오기~ Okay! If I sing this, you don't come out to the airport! 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 모두 굿나잇!!
vlive.english: Okay! If I sing this, you don't come out to the airport!

vlive.korean: 감탄사, 단어? 이건 서로 얘기해 주면 되지 않을까요? An exclamation or word? We can answer that for each other. 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: An exclamation or word? We can answer that for each other.

examples.korean: Yes? How can I help you? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 응? 내가 어떻게 도와주면 되겠니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes? How can I help you? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If they can’t get it to us in time, we’ll just have to do without. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 우리에게 그것을 시간 내에 못 갖다 주면 우린 그냥 그것 없이 견뎌야 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If they can’t get it to us in time, we’ll just have to do without. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The leaves will scorch if you water them in the sun. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 햇볕 속에서 물을 주면 잎이 누렇게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The leaves will scorch if you water them in the sun. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I can let you have it by next week. No probs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다음 주면 네게 그걸 줄 수 있어. 아무 문제없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can let you have it by next week. No probs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’ll do the job if you make it worth his while. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 그에게 해 볼 만하게 해 주면[보수를 두둑이 주면] 그가 그 일을 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’ll do the job if you make it worth his while. Add to Wordbook
